<p style="text-align: left;">
```{r, eval = FALSE}
# This map was created using the plotly demo
library(googleVis)
library(pwt8)

ul_colors = list(colors="['#F5A064', '#B70030', '#610039']")
Geo.map <- gvisGeoChart(ul_dataset, 
                        locationvar = "country", 
                        colorvar = "ul_safety_index", 
                        options = list(width = "100%", height = 600,
                                     colors = ul_colors))

ul_table <- gvisTable(ul_dataset,
                      options=list(width = 350, height = 600))

ul_index_map <- gvisMerge(Geo.map, ul_table, horizontal=TRUE,
                          tableOptions = 20) 
plot(ul_index_map)
ul_index_map$html$chart
cat(ul_index_map$html$chart, file="tmp.html")
```
